Slaski:
Magold - world of fairies, but there are not only Fairies, but also Cats. Before Fairies worshipped the Goddess Einhasad, but once betrayed her and rebelled against the will of the gods, for which they were locked up for forever the borders of our reality... the Creatures were ruled by the Gods, and mad Fairies... a Lot going on in Marmalde, and Cats got nothing to do with it!
